# exampleFLGP

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of exampleFLGP is to illustrate the usage of package FLGP with several examples, including classification problems and regression problems. All examples in the original paper have been contained in directory *main*, which involve Circles, 
MNIST and HCP fMRI.

## Installation

You can install the development version of exampleFLGP from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("junhuihe2000/exampleFLGP")
```
